tool_description: TikTok signature/encryption protocol service, stably support for a single customer with an average of millions of calls per day.
name: TiktokPerseus
title: TiktokPerseus

api_list.name: get_sign
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tiktokperseus2.p.rapidapi.com/get_sign"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tiktokperseus2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
